```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)

players <- read.csv("data/male_players.csv")

players <- players |>
  filter(league_name == "Premier League") |>
  filter(club_name %in% c("Arsenal", "Aston Villa", "Bournemouth", "Brentford", "Brighton & Hove Albion", "Burnley", "Chelsea", "Crystal Palace", "Everton", "Fullham", "Liverpool", "Luton Town", "Manchester City", "Manchester United", "Newcastle United", "Nottingham Forest", "Sheffield United", "Tottenham Hotspur", "West Ham United", "Wolverhampton Wanderers")) |>
  filter(player_positions != "GK") |>
  filter(update_as_of == "2023-09-22") |>
  select(player_id, short_name, long_name, overall, club_name, pace, shooting, passing, dribbling, defending, physic, value_eur, player_positions)

players <- players |>
  na.omit(players)

write_rds(players, file = "player_data.rds")
```
